import React, { useState } from "react"; import'../css/scoring.css'; import Select from 'react-select'; export const Scoring=()=>{ const [TeamA,setTeamA]=useState('Team A'); const [TeamB,setTeamB]=useState('Team B'); //to styling and editing opt.value === selectedBastman1) || null} onChange={(opt) => setSelectedBastman1(opt?.value)} isClearable placeholder="Select Batsman" styles={{ placeholder: (base) => ({ ...base, color: '#888', marginBottom:'10px', }), }} required /> opt.value === selectedbowler) || null} onChange={(opt) => setSelectedbowler(opt?.value)} isClearable placeholder="Select Bowler" styles={{ placeholder: (base) => ({ ...base, color: '#888', marginBottom:'10px', }), }} required />
) }
